favourite.article: I like this song, it is full of Spirit.

These words in this hymn are deeply, but easily to enjoy and exercise. We need CALL ON THE LORD JESUS' NAME for the mind set on the spirit is life, So I will walk in the Spirit today, Being filled with life and peace! Hallelujah, Amen!

Amen! There's now no condemnation brothers!
Let's walk in the spirit and be filled with Life and peace!
